resources.string:
${app_name} v0.5 Beta 2023 
\${app_name} is an open-source all-in-one solution for any route optimization problems. 

Â© ${dev_name} 2023

${app_name} is in Beta version and currently under development. Please regularly get the latest version as soon as it's available. 

This version of ${app_name} does not include local data saving, this feature will be implemented soon. For now, please consider signing in to allow cloud data saving instead. This feature requires internet. 

Data is encrypted in transit. Please do not worry about the data safety. 

Bug report: routemate@dsm.my.id
By logging in, you agree with Terms and Conditions
By registering, you agree with Terms and Conditions

string-array.name: dsmsolver_optimization_response_error_message
string-array.item: The optimization method will be implemented soon.

string-array.name: optimization_response_error_message
string-array.item: Make sure all the places are connected to road network.
Make sure all the places are connected to road network.
The optimization is not supported for the given combination of source, destination, and roundtrip. Please report to us for further investigation.
Check for places that are too far away from a road. No road segment could be matched for one or more places within the supplied radiuses.
Server restriction. Please try again later or contact us if the problem persists for too long.
The given request was not valid.
